name: In The Other Room
description:
This game was created in 36 hours as part of GGJ 2022 at the Perth (Australia) jam site.

If you could pass through the looking glass into someone else's world, would you? Even if that meant bringing someone else into your own reality, against their will? Explore mirror images of the same place, one war-torn and on the brink of destruction, and the other seemingly normal. Find out what, or who, is "In The Other Room".

Visuals, audio & programming: Joe Louis Robinson

Writing, Story & 2D art: Tyler Jacob Jones

Thanks to Erin Hutchinson & Robert Woods
